narratives.question_text: Were the resources provided to you by the School and University adequate for the fulfillment of the work assigned?  If not, please make suggestions.
comments: Instructor: Alan J. Plattus  Generally yes, but I think it's a no-brainer that every student should have at least two computer monitors. Having one monitor to make digital drawings is like having a monitor-sized drawing board to make hand drawings.

Instructor: Alan J. Plattus  I did have to meet with a business school librarian to learn about city research. It would have been valuable to direct our research interests to the appropriate city resources and institutions.
Instructor: Bimal Kausalya Mendis  No. I repeat only one critic knew anything about urban design.
Instructor: Bimal Kausalya Mendis  Fine.
Instructor: Bimal Kausalya Mendis  yes, they were.
Instructor: Bimal Kausalya Mendis  yes
Instructor: Edward Mitchell  Yes.
Instructor: Edward Mitchell  Yes
Instructor: Edward Mitchell  GOOD.
Instructor: Edward Mitchell  The resources were sufficient.
Instructor: Keller Easterling  fine.
Instructor: Keller Easterling  Yes.

Instructor: Keller Easterling  I wish the studio had been better organized. Assignments were often unclear, as were expectations as laid out in the syllabus. While I appreciated Ed's "hands-off" approach, I wish he had been a little more involved in terms of laying out clear assignments. I also think that the selection of two sites was problematic. I think it would have been easier to have assigned us a specific site.

Instructor: Keller Easterling  The school/course needs to bring in more guest speakers that deal with urban design in the real world to talk to the class. The only two such moments were Chris Starky talking about retaining water and a gentleman from Stamford talking about the city. What about transportation network? What about Stamford train station? And the symbiosis of different program in an urban setting?
Instructor: Margaret Deamer  Our library is so frustrating.
Instructor: Margaret Deamer  The library hours are generally inconvenient. The one-book out at-a-time policy is an impediment to education.
Instructor: Margaret Deamer  More Server space from the beginning would have been useful, as the server is crucial when working with partners.
Instructor: Sunil Bald  yes. although Stamford is a poor choice for a studio. do something more interesting like philadelphia or baltimore.
Instructor: Sunil Bald  yes.
Instructor: Sunil Bald  Excellent provision of resources.
